TEI.2.document_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 1, pp. 992-993

barker_notes.barker_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 1, pp. 992-993

div1.p: This is to Certify that Coatsworth P. Welborn (the bearer of this) is a man of respect and Esteem among us, and I do not hesitate to recommend him to the notice of any man or set of men, as deserving the good will and Esteem of all who may become acquainted with him
Given under my hand and seal this 20th day of Decr. 1824
Clk and J. P. for the Parish and State afd.
